meanings.definition: In an even and steady manner.
meanings.sent1: She walked equably along the path, never speeding up or slowing down.
meanings.sent2: The music played equably in the background, creating a calming atmosphere.

meanings.sent4: Time flowed equably, like a gentle stream meandering through the forest.
meanings.sent5: Her voice remained equably calm, even in the face of chaos.
